Package br.com.caelum.vraptor.view

Interface Summary
AcceptHeaderToFormat Translate the Accept header to a _format String
HttpResult A view that deals with HTTP protocol, sending status and error codes and adding headers.
LogicResult Logic result allows logics to redirect to another logic by invoking the method itself, in a very typesafe way.
PageResult A common forward/redirect/include page result.
PathResolver Decides the url to go to after a request was executed.
RefererResult Redirects or forwards to the Referer.
Status Allows status + header related results.
ValidationViewsFactory Component responsible for instantiating corresponding validation form of given view.
 

Class Summary
DefaultAcceptHeaderToFormat The default AcceptHeaderToFormat implementation searches for registered mime types.
DefaultHttpResult Implementation that delegates to HttpServletResponse
DefaultLogicResult The default implementation of LogicResult.
Uses cglib to provide proxies for client side redirect (url creation).
DefaultPageResult Default page result implementation.
DefaultPathResolver The default vraptor3 path resolver uses the type and method name as "/TypeName/methodName.result.jsp".
DefaultRefererResult  
DefaultStatus Allows header related results.
DefaultValidationViewsFactory Default implementation for ValidationViewsFactory If you want to extend this behavior use:
EmptyResult Does nothing
RequestOutjectMap The super-incredible MagicMap that exposes every request parameter in a map chain that never ends! Useful for invalid forms to display input data.
Results Some common results for most web based logics.
 

Exception Summary
ResultException
